section.65: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Narrated `Umar:I said, "O Allah's Messenger (ï·º)! Good and bad persons enter upon you, so I suggest that you order the mothers of the Believers (i.e. your wives) to observe veils." Then Allah revealed the Verses of Al- Hijab
